message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go that low.  The product is worth considerably more, and I'm willing to compromise.  I'm happy to offer it to you for $1300000.  This is a fair price that allows for both of us to make a good deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1250000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
